author: santapod
title: Marred by our exit
text:
Thank you Roger Hotel for inviting me to appraise our weeks visit.
We enjoyed our stay in very comfortable rooms and pleasant staff.
However , guests should be aware that in addition to the tourist tax there is a compulsory facility fee of $31 dollars per room for two people . Thats approx £235 per week. Because my friend and I had separate rooms , we are not a couple, we were charged this fee twice. £470 on top of our hotel charge. The facility fee I believe covers wifi and a coffee facility in the reception area , mornings only, there are no hot drinks facilities in the rooms. There may also be other facilities not recalled.
We accepted this additional fee however , what marred things right at the end when we knew we had to leave our rooms by 12pm and were not collected until 4.30pm was a grovelling discussion by myself to ask for extra time in the room . The reception area was bitterly cold as the front door opened to -degree temperature and the gale blew inside. My friend is 85 and to sit for 4.5hours in the cold reception lounge was not a pleasant thought.
I asked at reception if having paid the facility fee twice , but still only 2 people people , could we have the rooms until we left at 4.30pm. I was told that if I paid this would be possible but if not an extra 1 hour only, this was extended to 2 hours after some grouchy discussions , not nice.
Sadly this quite spoilt our outgoing time. We could not leave the hotel during the last 4 .5 hours as the temperature was minus and bitterly cold.
I do think if the Roger could offer us the room at a charge , they could have done so at No charge as we had paid so much more in their facility fee.
Maybe a thought for the future "Roger" otherwise really nice.
